874150.name: Block Heads: Instakill - Military Skin Pack
874150.description:
Unlock more customization options for Block Heads: Instakill. Featuring new skins, sounds, guns, and kill styles! With a focus on the military aspect of everyday life.

  • 30 NEW Skins, with 3 variations each, including: Medic, Pilot, Jungle Commando, Sniper, and a General.
  • 8 NEW Hats: Fire Fighter Hats, Caps, and Pilot Hats.
  • 6 NEW Hats, some with variations, including: War Helmet, Special Forces Night Vision Helmet, Officer Hat.
  • 4 NEW Outfits, some with variations, including: Red Berret outfit and a Bomb Disposal outfit.
  • 5 NEW Gun Sounds: The sounds are bold and brash - perfect for putting your enemy in the trash.
  • 2 NEW Kill Styles: Use incendiary rounds to set your enemies aflame or shock them to death using the new "Shocker" round.
